author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were killed and another injured in an accident near HUDCO on Tuesday.

According to HUDCO police, the incident occurred when the victims Lokesh (19), Shaktivel (19), both residents of Kumudepalli, who were riding along with Venkatraj (23) on a two-wheeler, rammed a stationary lorry that was parked by the road side.

Lokesh and Shaktivel died on the spot, while Venkatraj had been admitted to Hosur Government Hospital with injuries. Police have registered a case.
title: Two killed in accident
